name: JummpJumpAround
description:
I've been learning to use the Unreal Engine 4 and this is a small byproduct of that. It's a complete game which I'm no longer working on and has everything in that I wanted (Timer, Slow motion and other small things).

If you have any problems or questions please feel free to send me a message

Also, i'd like to thank  Matthew Palaje for the tutorials that helped me make this.

Thanks :)
